I showed it to my school, it was real popular, and because it was the free version I was showing them, was legal, but my schools tight security soon blocked it after christmas break.

I am all for getting KSP into schools. It\'s not just about getting into space as it really helps illustrate the mechanics of gravity, air resistance, and ballistic travel. For the longest time I just couldn\'t wrap my head around the concept that any object in orbit around the planet is constantly falling. Then I played KSP and put a ship into orbit myself and could see how it worked. Mind blown.
